function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffective reachability to patients","Impact":"Delayed treatment and care for infected individuals","Mitigation":"Utilize IoT for remote monitoring and communication with patients","Technologies":"IoT devices, sensors, and communication platforms","People":"Infected individuals in need of medical care","Owner":"Healthcare providers and medical professionals"},{"Description":"Lack of adequate and organized facilities","Impact":"Inability to provide effective care and support for infected individuals","Mitigation":"Implement IoT methodology for efficient and organized healthcare facilities","Technologies":"IoT devices, data analytics, and remote management systems","People":"Healthcare providers, facility managers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and facility management companies"},{"Description":"Underutilization of IoHT/IoMT","Impact":"Missed opportunities to enhance and improve resolved cases","Mitigation":"Promote awareness and adoption of IoHT/IoMT guidelines and facilities","Technologies":"IoT healthcare devices and platforms","People":"Healthcare professionals, medical researchers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and research institutions"}]}
